summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4921 for the improvement of Garden Street from Rainier Avenue to 46th Avenue South; by constructing watermains, and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56368, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
